column2: By submitting this form, you are hereby allowing the Bank of the Philippine Islands (BPI) use and store your personal data (such as full name, mobile number and email address) for BPI personnel to communicate with you with regards to your interest in the "Auto Buy Now Sales Program". Through your expressed consent, you acknowledge and agree that your information may be processed and shared within BPI's authorized representatives. In compliance with the Data Privacy Act (R.A 10173), the Bank will strive to keep the information private and confidential and will be retained for as long as necessary in order to comply with internal audit and other regulatory requirements and for the fulfillment of the aforementioned purposes. To know more about how we process and protect your personal data, please refer to our Data Privacy Statement https://www.buenamano.ph/page/buena-mano-data-privacy-statement.
column3: Please indicate if you are an individual or a company/entity bidder.
